item.title: Wheelie Bins illegally left in Road., 2nd August
item.description:
Residents of 82,Bastion Road,SE20RG regularly leave their wheelie bins in the road outside their house to secure their parking space. This is both dangerous and illegal. REPORTED SEVERAL TIMES.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glendown Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown tree at front of house (health and safety risk), 2nd August
item.description:
Tree touching upstairs bedroom window. Elderly housebound mother can't have windows open; Flies, insects, etc. - even SQUIRRELS get in - Major health hazard (she has serious immune system disorders). Branches have smashed windows when windy

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southborough Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two plastic barriers left on grass verge fronting 22 or 24 Mays Hill Rd, Shortlands., 2nd August
item.description:
Two left over plastic guard barriers on grass verge fronting 22 or 24 Mays Hill Rd, Shortlands seemingly following a completed small concrete repair to the footway vehicle crossover.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): May's Hill Road, Shortlands, London

item.category: Utility Works and Temporary Traffic Lights

item.title: Replacement of two cones with an official white paint line at 28, Mays Hill Rd, Shortlands., 2nd August
item.description:
Please, arrange with the householder to remove the long-present two orange cones on the carriageway and for the council to paint a white bar line on the carriageway instead, extending beyond the actual dropped kerb width so that the householder can safely and easily use the crossover without others physically parking badly, restricting access and egress, and allowing safe visibility on this fast moving bending road. Highway fronting 28, Mays Hill Road, Shortlands
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): May's Hill Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public tree needs cutting back to private boundary, 2nd August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queen Anne Avenue, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wiring running from an upstairs flat over communal sheds and fencing., 2nd August
item.description:
A live wire running from a flat 126 Fields Estate. It hangs over the communal sheds and loosely runs along the communal fencing. The concern is if this wire were to come loose, it could pose a serious fire hazard or potentially cause even greater harm.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Middleton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bikes left on road, 2nd August
item.description:
These bikes are starting to be dumped at the end of our road. There is a blind man who lives on our road and would of course find these a problem. We suspect our road may be a new boundary for dropping these as there are more and more of them being dumped.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tennyson Road, Penge, London
